sentences.en: A simple alloy of nickel and titanium nitinol has some perplexing properties.
sentences.cn: 作为镍和钛的简单的一种合金,镍钛诺具有一些令人惊叹的特征.

sentences.en: Engineers have produced prototype engines that are driven by the force of nitinol springing from one shape to another as it alternately encounters hot and cold water.
sentences.cn: 工程师们已制造出一些发动机样机，利用镍钛合金在交替遇热水和冷水时迅速改变形状所产生的力做推动力。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the therapeutic method and effects of malignant tracheal stenosis nitinol memory alloy stents.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨气管支架置入术治疗恶性气管狭窄的方法及疗效.
